title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 51.7 - Service of papers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 51.7 - Service of papers

State Regulations

All notices and papers connected with a hearing, other than the notice of hearing and statement of charges, if any, may be served by ordinary mail. Except where otherwise provided, service by mail shall be deemed complete three days after mailing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
51.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
